Say, you need to set up a makeshift EEG lab in an office? Easy-peasy---only, try to move the hardware as little as possible, especially laptops with dongles sticking out. The rest is a trail of snapshots devoid of captions, clutter, a sink and a shower room, as this is only an ancillary, temporary, extraordinary little lab.
